file_content.text:
In light of the escalation in recreational hunting being undertaken by our Mandalorian allies and its negative effect on eliminating more pressing threats to Imperial prosperity, Moff Yurrion hereby declares a bounty on all remaining packs of wild womp rats in the Southern Jundland Wastes.
All personnel interested in pursuing these creatures should do so at platoon strength only, disregarding this warning will result in death benefits being forfeit. Womp rat skulls will be tallied and bounty paid at the designated pay station.
[You log onto the Imperial Governor's Bounty Board and find a new entry:] [The message board has nothing worthy of interest.]
